front.title: Applicability of Path Computation Element (PCE) for Fast Reroute (FRR) Boundary Node protection.

abstract.t: Path computation element (PCE) can be used to compute a label switched path that spans across multiple domains. This document explain the mechanism of Fast Re-Route (FRR) where a point of local repair (PLR) needs to find the appropriate merge point (MP) to do bypass path computation using PCE. In case of boundary node protection when PCE confidentiality (path key) is enabled, new mechanisms are suggested in this document.
